name: Snowflake Snip
description:
Drive your scissors-car to cut the folded paper and make a beautiful snowflake!

You will be scored on how similar your snowflake is to the goal pattern, but even if you don't do very well you can keep playing. Try your best to follow the patterns, or get creative and make your own instead. Happy Winter!

Programming by MorganQuirk and Darzington
Credits for assets are available in-game.
